request.description:
API: 	zone-authority-authorization	
Business Statement:	
User will select Role for Login, after user is authenticated by UAE pass, SWS will pass role and emirates Id to each Zone Authority to check if they have records for given emirates Id for selected role.This API will return data bases on Active User and Active Company.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	 GET <base-url>/users/{role-name}/{emirates-id}

response.name: zone-user-auth-failed

request.description:
API Code:zone-authority-licence-check

Business Statement:If authorization is failed to find emirates-id under given role, then SWS will pass licence number with role to check if licence is registered and active for given role. This will allow SWS to inform user to contact company admin.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	GET <base-url>/companies/{licence-authority}/{trade-licence}/{role-name}

response.name: zone-company-auth-failed

request.description:
API Code:zone-authority-users-list

Business Statement:After successful authentication from UAE pass and successful authorization from any zone authority. SWS will take users to Workspace. If user role in zone authority is Admin, then workspace will allow users to manage users under them. This API will return only Active Users.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	GET <base-url>/users/{licence-authority}/{trade-licence}/{role-name}

possible User roles are: [ "User","Admin","Viewer"]

response.name: zone-company-users-failed

request.description:
API Code:	zone-authority—create-user

Business Statement:	SWS will allow admin users to create users from SWS user interface.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	POST <base-url>/users/{licence-authority}/{trade-licence}/{role-name}

Authentication:	Authentication header

response.name: zone-company-users-create-failed

request.description:
API Code:zone-authority-register-company

Business Statement:	In case of trade licence is not listed in zone authority system, SWS will allow user to initiate registration request from SWS User Interface.

Roles are: Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	POST <base-url>/companies/{role-name}

Authentication:	Authentication header

request.description:
API Code:	zone-authority—update-user

Business Statement:	SWS will allow admin users to update users from SWS user interface.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	PUT <Base-API>users/{licence-authority}/{trade-licence}/{role-name}/{emirates-id}

Authentication	Authentication header

response.name: zone-company-users-update-failed

request.description:
API Code: zone-authority—delete-user

Business Statement:	SWS will allow admin users to delete users from SWS user interface.

Roles are : Contractor, Consultant, Owner

API Publisher:	DM, DDA, Trakhees

API Consumer:	SWS

API Endpoint:	DELETE <base-url>/users/{licence-authority}/{trade-licence}/{role-name}/{emirates-id}

Authentication	Authentication header

response.name: zone-company-users-delete-failed
